title: Sum of Nodes with Even-Valued Grandparent
content: Given a binary tree, return the sum of values of nodes with even-valued grandparent. (A grandparent of a node is the parent of its parent, if it exists.) If there are no nodes with an even-valued grandparent, return 0. The number of nodes in the tree is between 1 and . The value of nodes is between 1 and 100.
